description: Rhetoric and composition are academic fields within English studies that take up the questions of how meaning is made and negotiated in a variety of historical, geographical, and media-based contexts. This advanced topics course provides students with a chance to build upon skills and knowledge from the 200-level rhetoric and composition courses. Topics could include presidential rhetoric, classical rhetoric, feminist rhetorics, and community literacy. Offered annually. Prerequisite: FYW.
name: Top: AdvTop Rhet/Comp: Feminist Rhe
title: Advanced Topics in Rhetoric and Composition: Feminist Rhetorics
